channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Strange Chores
channel.desc: Charlie takes a three-headed monster dog to school for pet day, but his unwillingness to enforce the rules sees it grow bigger and more dangerous.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danny and Mick
channel.desc: Joy has hired a new inflatable assault course for the leisure centre, and the boys are tasked with inflating it. Once done, Danny challenges Lance to a race - but who will be victorious.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Bitesize Daily: 9-11 Year Olds
channel.desc: How to use parenthesis, semi-colons and colons.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Out of This World
channel.desc: Dr Maggie uncovers the people and the missions that are tasked with looking for aliens in space and asks whether life really is out there and how we will find out. Star guest Sofia Sheikh searches for intelligent life in the universe, while Maggie answers all your space questions. Her Top 5 lists the places where we might find extraterrestrial life. Buckle up, it?s time to go Out of This World.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Our School
channel.desc: While classical music is a part of everyday life at the boarding school, Queen fan Ella wants to turn the volume up by starting the school?s first rock band - but who will join her, and will they face a tough crowd.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: DIY Deadly with Steve Backshall
channel.desc: In this unprecedented time of lockdown there has never been a better time to learn about the wildlife around us, and Deadly 60 fans have been sending in their videos, photos and questions for Steve Backshall to answer. In this episode Steve explores our aerial assassins, and judging by CBBC?s most observant viewers, the skies above us are home to a huge variety of deadly animals! Steve unravels the mysteries of a bird nest and a feather collection, explains that kites are spreading far and wide, and how to bring birds to your bird table without making them dinner themselves! In a DIY demo, Steve then shows us how to make fat ball dessert for our feathered friends, before basking in butterfly, bee and wasp glory! But that?s not all. The audience gets their chance to Beat Backshall in a 60 second quickfire round. The question is, how many can Steve get right before his time is up? In a fun-filled, fast and furious 13 minutes, we?ll also get to see some of the best bits from 13 years of deadly exploration. In this episode Steve gets hunted down by a silent forest predator, and catches the world?s biggest and most feisty wasp.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: One Zoo Three
channel.desc: The zoo brothers take inspiration from animals that live together. Can they help the sun bears to share? And how will Kasanga the African lion get along with his new partner.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Dengineers
channel.desc: The presenters look back at some of our amazing dens from previous series and catch up with our dengineers to see how the dens have changed their lives. Lauren and Joe revisit the eco, Scottish castle, Turkish and sport dens.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Operation Ouch!
channel.desc: Identical twins Dr Chris and Dr Xand van Tulleken experiment and explore their way through the fascinating world of medicine and biology. Chris and Xand will let the viewer in to their exclusive world of medicine and explain the awesome things our bodies can do. The doctors experiment on their muscles to show how they work. Dr Chris meets some wriggly maggots that are helping to heal a sore foot, and Dr Xand goes on call with an emergency ambulance team. Meanwhile, over in accident and emergency, one patient has some grit in his head after a fall in the playground and another has injured his neck after performing a karate kick.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Histories
channel.desc: A special episode about King Henry VIII, starring Rowan Atkinson. We meet the young Henry as he struggles with his boring dad Henry VII, before becoming king himself and going through wives like most people go through toothbrushes! Meanwhile, across the world, we meet the great Ottoman leader Suleiman the Magnificent in Turkey and the mad, bad and very dangerous-to-know Zhengde Emperor in China. With, of course, our host Rattus to guide the way.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danny and Mick
channel.desc: It?s the Invention of the Year awards, and everyone at the leisure centre has ideas they are hoping to pitch. Business mogul Jacqui Williams turns up to judge and isn?t impressed with what she sees. Danny?s invention of a chair that does everything might turn her head, however.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Secret Life of Boys
channel.desc: Ginger and Ethan are given the runaround while babysitting, Robbie and Andy's friendship is put to the test and a heartbroken Matt returns when Tabs rejects his proposal.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: The Odd Squad investigate strange events. Olive and Otto must stop zeroes from disappearing before the town is destroyed and Otto turns into a baby.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Octonauts
channel.desc: Captain Barnacles and his niece and nephew, Ursa and Orson, must rescue walrus pups who are stranded on a runaway ice floe - before it collides with a huge iceberg.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Big Lizard
channel.desc: Finding an earth probe makes Dad homesick. When Big Lizard accidentally destroys it, Cosima knows what to do. She recreates the contents - Proxima-style.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Baron Greenback brews a plot to steal every beverage on the planet and mix them all together, making an undrinkable, disgusting sludge. By depriving the population of their much-needed drinks break he'll cause worldwide exhaustion. Danger Mouse seems unfazed, but without his cherished tea Penfold wilts on their rescue mission. Can Danger Mouse thwart the baron's thirsty plot.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: A mishap on a mission leaves Danger Mouse confused - why is Penfold not talking to him? It might be because today is Penfold's birthday and he hasn't remembered it again! Squawk sprays DM with her experimental empathy gas in the hope that he will find it easier to care about other people. The newly empathetic DM is a changed mouse! One who seems to think breaking the Baron out of prison is a great idea.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: The tired heroes must quest to find out and stop whatever is making the loud wailing noise that has kept the residents of the forest up all night.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Ninja Express
channel.desc: With their juice bar empty, a grandma and granddaughter ask the Ninjas for a mariachi band to entice customers - but Konpeki?s trumpet playing threatens the delivery.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Deadly 60
channel.desc: Steve Backshall heads to a place very few people ever go: Snake Island in Brazil, where the concentration of snakes is higher than anywhere else on earth.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Malory Towers
channel.desc: Felicity is on track to win the cross country race, but when she fails to cross the finish line, Darrell fears the worst and goes in search of her - with dramatic consequences.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a school of crabs that live in an underwater city.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: Children's animation. Set on a remote rural farm, Shaun's flock leads a peaceful life under the watchful eye of their sheepdog, Bitzer, but Shaun's insatiable curiosity often leads him into the unlikeliest adventures. One dark and stormy night the flock are unable to sleep. Shaun investigates a series of sinister events only to discover who is really scaring the sheep.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: The gang enter Pieface into a comedy contest to make him realise how brilliantly funny he is. Determined to win the crown, Walter uses the latest WilburCorp gadget on the unsuspecting audience to sway the vote.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: Hoofius has decided not to quest. Not because he would rather be doing a puzzle or playing his panpipes (though that is rather enjoyable), but because this will be his 1,000th quest and will be added to the Scroll of Honour for all to see for eternity. His friends reluctantly quest without him, but when they don?t return, Hoofius soon comes to regret staying behind.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: After Cat and Cheese are mistaken for young kids at the hotel daycare, they are forced into the baby play area. Refusing to be stuck there, Cheese plots to escape.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: After the kids crash Mom and Dad's anniversary trip, they try to make amends by finding Gramps' long-lost wedding rings.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: A Super Lemming transforms any plant he touches into a giant.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
channel.desc: Sandy invites Karen and Mrs Puff out for a night on the town.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Little Lunch
channel.desc: Tamara sprains her ankle and can?t do the beep test, so she decides to coach Debra-Jo.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: Orli has rescued a clam which needs to be returned to its home in the 60th dimension via a portal on the 60th floor. However, to get there, she must negotiate HQ?s odd lift network.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Strange Chores
channel.desc: For Charlie to defeat a monster that feeds on embarrassment, he must humiliate himself in the school play by starring as the Rat Prince.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Total Dramarama
channel.desc: Chef takes the kids on a trip to a museum, and Duncan goes on a mission to scare Courtney.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pok?mon Horizons
channel.desc: Liko and Roy reunite with one of their friends from the Rising Volt Tacklers.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir
channel.desc: Ladybug and Cat Noir face their enemy through time.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Malory Towers
channel.desc: Jean reveals uncomfortable truths about the Grayling family which shock Lily, while Darrell and Alicia plan the best prank ever, involving ancient curses and a skeleton.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: Reality-style drama following the lives of a group of dancers at the Next Step Dance Studio. In order to win Riley back, James suggests she gives him a list of tasks to complete to prove his dedication, starting with breaking up with Beth. Emily further isolates herself from the team to gain Amanda's trust. When Michelle won't answer calls from the studio, Chloe visits Michelle at school.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy finds a sceptre that covers anything it touches in gold.[(96057)]
